title: 各种插件的报错，求告知如何解决
author: res_js
txt_content:
[21:18:53] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling PTweaks v6.0.8 (Is it up to date?)

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/bukkit/craftbukkit/v1_6_R3/CraftServer

[21:18:53] [Server thread/ERROR]: Cannot load configuration from stream

[21:18:54] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling CoreProtect v2.10.0 (Is it up to date?)

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.Server.getOnlinePlayers()Ljava/util/Collection;

[21:18:54] [Server thread/WARN]: [Lockette] Error loading strings-zn.yml: while scanning an anchor

[21:18:54] [Server thread/ERROR]: Cannot load configuration from stream

[21:18:58] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling ScoreboardStats v0.9 (Is it up to date?)

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadConfiguration(Ljava/io/Reader;)Lorg/bukkit/configuration/file/YamlConfiguration;

[22:34:54] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event PlayerDeathEvent to DeathMessages v2.6.2

这是所有的报错，下面上插件图片

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
res_js 发表于 2015-3-30 16:47
语言文件是不是因为没有转uft8的格式才语言不对，我的插件有汉字的都要转码，谢谢你了， 上面那三个插件 ...
PTweaks 
CoreProtect 
ScoreboardStats

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
PTweaks v6.0.8
CoreProtect v2.10.0
ScoreboardStats v0.9

这个3个是因为版本问题，而加载不了config，更新一下版本即可【注意你的服务器版本】

Lockette
这个是因为加载不了语言文件。最简单的方式还是换一个jar

replies.author: res_js
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-3-30 23:37
PTweaks v6.0.8
CoreProtect v2.10.0
ScoreboardStats v0.9
语言文件是不是因为没有转uft8的格式才语言不对，我的插件有汉字的都要转码，谢谢你了， 上面那三个插件你有spigot 1.72的吗。

replies.txt_content:
res_js 发表于 2015-3-30 17:21

ScoreboardStats的话是你弄错了吧 你安装的是0.9版本 我给你的是0.8.3 【配置删了自动重生，如果jar弄错了重新安装】

replies.author: res_js

ScoreboardStats的话是你弄错了吧 你安装的是0.9版本 我给你的是0.8.3 【配置删了自动重生 ...
谢谢，我去看看

replies.author: res_js
replies.txt_content:
res_js 发表于 2015-4-2 04:30
谢谢，我去看看
可以用了，配置文件怎么办？
# Main configuration

# Compatible mode with other plugins like HealthBar, ColoredTags, GhostPlayer or McCombatLevel
compatibilityMode: false

disabled-worlds:
  - world_nether
  - city

# This will not count vanished players in the online value
hide-vanished: false

Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lStats'
  # seconds
  # For instant updates you can or 1 and it will update every second
  Update-delay: 2
  Items:
    # The Title must have under 48 characters
    # Title: Type
    '&9Online': '%online%'
    '&9Money': '%money%'

# Let ScoreboardStats track stats (kills, deaths, mobkills, killstreak) You need no plugin for this
enable-pvpstats: false

Temp-Scoreboard-enabled: false

Temp-Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lTop Kills'
  # %mob% | %kills% | %killstreak%
  Type: '%kills%'
  Color: '&9'
  # How many Players would be displayed
  Items: 5
  Intervall-show: 300
  Intervall-disappear: 300

pluginUpdate: true
